name: BS Super Mario USA: Power Challenge: Dai-3-kai
overview: BS Super Mario USA Power Challenge is an ura- or gaiden-version of Super Mario Bros. 2 for the Satellaview system featuring graphical enhancements similar to its Super Mario All-Stars version. While the underlying gameplay itself is largely similar, new and arranged content has been added. This is the week 3 release: "Fry Guy at the Sea of Ice".
